caption.center: ABRAHAM SOMMER, Individually, and as Guardian ad Litem of HERBERT SOMMER, an
Infant, over the Age of Fourteen Years, Respondents, v. ROBERT B. STEARNS

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order entered October 9, 1940, granting plaintiff's motion for a preference unanimously reversed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements, and the motion denied. Appeal from order entered October 30, 1940, denying defendants' motion for a reargument unanimously dismissed. No opinion.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Martin, P.J., Glennon, Untermyer, Cohn and Callahan, JJ.; Untermyer, J., taking no part.
